column1: Executive MSc Social Business and Entrepreneurship
column2: London School of Economics and Political Science
column5: Ask LSEThe Executive MSc Social Business and Entrepreneurship is LSE’s ground-breaking programme for business leaders and entrepreneurs across the private, public and non-profit sectors.Making a profit doesn’t have to mean compromising social purpose.Our ground-breaking Executive Master’s in Social Business and Entrepreneurship goes beyond traditional business degrees by putting social purpose at the heart of business education, integrating sophisticated management training with a genuine commitment to social impact.Conceived as an antidote to the MBA, the programme is aimed at students who wish to combine entrepreneurialism and business rigour with a commitment to public benefit, and conversely those who want to bring a social focus to business.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
